text: Well, that's what I asked myself, Piglet. What?
speaker: Винни-Пух

text: And what do you think you'll answer yourself?
speaker: Пятачок

text: I shall have to wait until I catch up with it.
speaker: Винни-Пух

text: Pooh, for a bear of very little brain...
speaker: Пятачок

text: you sure are a smart one!
speaker: Пятачок
